short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CSS Minifier App, built with CleanCSS and PrismJs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clean CSS is a CSS minifier based on the Clean CSS library by GoalSmashers. This little app allows you to easily minify CSS. You can copy and paste from your editor and see the css being minified on the fly. Then you can copy the minified version with the click of a button.
